|character          = Thoma
|date               = 2023-01-09
|zh                 = 
;今天是托马的生日哦，我们快去为他庆祝吧！
:'''托马：'''把这些饭团也拿着吧，给小动物们带些吃的。
:'''派蒙：'''好呀，毛衣也快织好了，我们一会儿就出发。
:'''托马：'''哇，上次教学之后，旅行者进步很大嘛！
:'''托马：'''不过，这一件是不是太宽松了？
:'''旅行者：'''嗯…好像是欸。要不派蒙试试看？合适的话就送你啦。
:'''派蒙：'''什么嘛，这明显就不是给人穿的衣服吧！手和脚都露不出来了！
:'''托马：'''哈哈，那就留给太郎丸吧，它一定会喜欢的！
|dialogue_review_zh = 「毛衣就留给太郎丸吧，它一定会喜欢的！」
|en                 =
;Today is [[Thoma]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with him!
:'''Thoma:''' Here, take these [[Onigiri]]. They're for the little critters.
:'''Paimon:''' Okay! We're almost done knitting the sweater, too. We can leave soon!
:'''Thoma:''' Wow, you've improved a lot since I last taught you how to do this, Traveler!
:'''Thoma:''' Isn't this one a little too big, though?
:'''Traveler:''' Mmm... I think you're right. Why don't you try it on, Paimon? If it fits, you can have it!
:'''Paimon:''' Come on, this doesn't fit Paimon at all! Paimon's arms and legs wouldn't fit through the holes!
:'''Thoma:''' Haha, why don't we give it to [[Taroumaru]]? I'm sure he'll love it!
|dialogue_review_en = "Why don't we give the sweater to Taroumaru? I'm sure he'll love it!"
}}
